entity.name: DataTransfer
entity.query: SELECT anti.id,sm.ID as Sample_Metadata_ID, anti.Antibiotic,anti.Drug_Symbol, anti.Laboratory_Typing_Method,anti.Laboratory_Typing_Method_Version_or_Reagent,anti.Laboratory_Typing_Platform, anti.Measurement,anti.Measurement_Sign,anti.Measurement_Units,anti.Resistance_Phenotype,anti.Testing_Standard, anti.Vendor FROM Sample_Metadata sm ,Antibiogram anti where anti.Sample_Metadata_ID = sm.ID
